jChatBox.Util
Class Decrypt

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jChatBox.Util.Decrypt
public class Decrypt
extends java.lang.Object

This class tranforms cipher text (OXW file) into PLAIN text. Public Key (Modulus + Exponent) included.
Don't try to implement a "KeyGen", we used asymetric encryption ;-)

Field Summary
protected static byte[] dec_table
          A static array that maps ASCII code points to a 6-bit integer, or -1 for an invalid code point.
protected static char[] enc_table
          A static array that maps 6-bit integers to a specific char.

          Constructor.
